missions.title: SDG Tutorial: Education Access Data
missions.description:
The UN Education Division is analyzing school enrollment data across different regions. They need information about specific countries and regions to identify areas with the lowest primary school enrollment rates.

Try this:
SELECT * FROM education_metrics;
missions.hint: Use SELECT * to get all columns from education_metrics.
missions.successMessage: Great! You've identified countries with the lowest primary school enrollment rates.

missions.title: SDG Tutorial: Education Access Filtering
missions.description:
The UN Education Division needs to focus their resources on the most critical areas. Find countries with primary enrollment rates below 50%, ordered from lowest to highest.

Hint: Use WHERE to filter and ORDER BY to sort.
missions.hint:
Try this query:
SELECT country_name, region, primary_enrollment_rate
FROM education_metrics
WHERE primary_enrollment_rate < 50
ORDER BY primary_enrollment_rate ASC;
missions.successMessage: Excellent work! These countries need immediate attention to improve education access.

missions.title: SDG Tutorial: Education Funding Analysis
missions.description:
The Global Education Foundation wants to know which countries get the most education results relative to their spending. Calculate a literacy per spending point metric.

Challenge: Divide literacy rates by education spending percentages.
missions.hint:
You can perform calculations in SELECT statements:
SELECT country_name, education_spending_percent_gdp, literacy_rate,
ROUND(literacy_rate / education_spending_percent_gdp, 2) as literacy_per_spending_point
FROM education_funding
ORDER BY literacy_per_spending_point DESC;
missions.successMessage: Great analysis! You've identified which countries achieve strong literacy outcomes relative to their education spending.

missions.title: SDG Tutorial: Gender Equality in Education
missions.description:
The Gender Equality in Education Initiative is analyzing the gap between male and female enrollment rates. Identify countries with the largest gender gaps favoring males in primary education.

Challenge: Calculate the difference between male and female enrollment rates.
missions.hint:
Use subtraction to find gender gaps:
SELECT country_name, region, male_primary_enrollment, female_primary_enrollment,
male_primary_enrollment - female_primary_enrollment as primary_gender_gap
FROM gender_education_metrics
WHERE male_primary_enrollment > female_primary_enrollment
ORDER BY primary_gender_gap DESC;
missions.successMessage: Excellent analysis! You've identified countries with significant gender disparities in education access.

missions.title: SDG Tutorial: Technology and Education
missions.description:
The Future Learning Foundation is studying the correlation between technology access and educational outcomes. Join the country_tech_access and education_outcomes tables to analyze this relationship.

Challenge: Use JOIN to combine data from two tables.
missions.hint:
Join tables on country_id:
SELECT
cta.country_name, cta.region, cta.internet_access_schools_percent,
cta.computers_per_student, eo.literacy_rate, eo.primary_completion_rate
FROM country_tech_access cta
JOIN education_outcomes eo ON cta.country_id = eo.country_id
ORDER BY cta.internet_access_schools_percent DESC;
missions.successMessage: Excellent work! You've successfully joined tables to analyze the relationship between technology access and educational outcomes.

missions.title: SDG Advanced: Regional Education Analysis
missions.description:
The UN Education Division wants to understand regional patterns in education metrics. Analyze the regional_metrics table to identify regions with both low primary and secondary enrollment rates.

Challenge: Create a comprehensive regional analysis.
missions.hint:
Analyze regional enrollment patterns:
SELECT region_name, primary_enrollment_rate, secondary_enrollment_rate, post_secondary_enrollment_rate
FROM regional_metrics
WHERE primary_enrollment_rate < 90 OR secondary_enrollment_rate < 70
ORDER BY secondary_enrollment_rate ASC;
missions.successMessage: Great regional analysis! You've identified regions that need significant educational support.

missions.title: SDG Advanced: Education Intervention Analysis
missions.description:
The SDG Education Task Force is evaluating different intervention programs. Find which types of educational interventions have been most effective by analyzing the intervention_programs and intervention_results tables.

Challenge: Join tables and calculate effectiveness by intervention type.
missions.hint:
Analyze intervention effectiveness:
SELECT
ip.intervention_type,
COUNT(*) as program_count,
ROUND(AVG(ir.completion_percent_change), 1) as avg_completion_increase
FROM intervention_programs ip
JOIN intervention_results ir ON ip.program_id = ir.program_id
GROUP BY ip.intervention_type
ORDER BY avg_completion_increase DESC;
missions.successMessage: Excellent analysis! You've identified which education interventions have been most effective at improving completion rates.
